snippet: Less than three months after the Justice Department sued Meridian, Miss., over discipline procedures, a report said that “overly harsh” policies were common throughout the state.
abstract: Report by group of civil rights organizations, less than three months after the Justice Department sued Meridian, Miss, over school discipline procedures, says 'overly harsh' policies are common throughout the state.
